logic

Class QImageExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.QImageExtractor

  • public class QImageExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic image extraction class. You load whatever image you desire, and then you can use given functions to slice and dice the image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QImageExtractor(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Attach the given Buffered image to this object.
      QImageExtractor(java.lang.String image)
      Specify the path to the image and it will be loaded.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the image that is currently loaded in this object.

      Slice and dice method for this object.
      boolean loadImage(java.lang.String image)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • QImageExtractor

        public QImageExtractor(java.lang.String image)
        Specify the path to the image and it will be loaded. Please load pngs only.
        Parameters:
        image - The path where the image you want to load is located.

      • QImageExtractor

        public QImageExtractor(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Attach the given Buffered image to this object. Why would you want this method is beoynd me, but enjoy.
        Parameters:
        image - The image that you want to have sliced and diced.

    • Method Detail

      • loadImage

        public boolean loadImage(java.lang.String image)
        Load the image given the path. Png only please.
        Parameters:
        image - The path where the image is located.
        Returns:
        True if loading was successful, false otherwise. You will also have error printed if false.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Returns the image that is currently loaded in this object.
        Returns:
        Image, which is the current image loaded into this object.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Slice and dice method for this object.
        Parameters:
        x - the left x location.
        y - the top y location.
        width - width of the image you want extracted.
        height - height of the image you want extracted.
        Returns:
        the extracted part of the image you wanted.
